title: Hercules Beetle
summaries: The Hercules Beetle is a Hardmode, post-Plantera accessory that increases the damage of summon weapons by 15% and increases their knockback by 2. It is sold by the Witch Doctor for 40 if he is spoken to in the Jungle, and while the Pygmy Staff is in the player's inventory.

statistics.Tooltip:
Increases summon damage by 15%
Increases the knockback of your minions
statistics.Buy: 40
statistics.Sell: 8

ingredients.value:
• [img:Necromantic Scroll]Necromantic Scroll
  • [img:Hercules Beetle]Hercules Beetle
